metadata.title: CVE-2024-47176 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple bugs leading to info leak and remote code execution

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-47176` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cups-browsed - 1.28.15-0ubuntu1.3
cups-filters - 1.28.15-0ubuntu1.3
cups-filters-core-drivers - 1.28.15-0ubuntu1.3
libcupsfilters1 - 1.28.15-0ubuntu1.3
libfontembed1 - 1.28.15-0ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cups-filters package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.28.15-0ubuntu1.3').
